name: BodyTrackingComponent.Target
desc: Body-tracking settings for selecting a person to track.

items.name: case any
items.desc: Any person that is detected in front of the camera.

items.name: static func == (BodyTrackingComponent.Target, BodyTrackingComponent.Target) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two targets are equal.

items.name: static func != (BodyTrackingComponent.Target, BodyTrackingComponent.Target) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two targets are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the target by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the target.
